website_summaries.verdict: A good mixture of candle and globe chandelier design. Fits well with many decor styles.
pros: Energy efficient light bulbs provide plenty of illumination for the average kitchen or dining space
Small enough to fit in small or cramped rooms
cons: Fake candlelights may come across as cheaply made

customer_reviews.title: More Beautiful in Person!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is gorgeous. We searched for months to find the perfect light above our table: online, in many stores, and this completes our space! Based on size we could have gone with the smaller 3 light model, but we needed more light so we chose this size. Our dining table sits 6-8 and we feel it compliments the space. The light fixture came assembled. Only had to screw on outter ring. This fixture is solid & heavy and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: WifeMomma30

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find!
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a long time for a new dining room chandelier and I’m so glad I found this one! Looks amazing above my farmhouse wood table and very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a little hesitation because the images for the light didn't show it from multiple angles and I was not 100% sure I would like it once I could see it. But the price was great and since it was for my bedroom, I wanted to be value-minded about my lighting choice (so I could save some of my budget for lighting in other areas of the house). The lights look incredible! They were delivered in a few days, my husband installed them without any problems (all parts were there, no issues). I'm attaching a before/after picture -- because the new lighting makes a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable & bright
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this light!! I live in a bi-level and used it in our entry way and it lights up there AND the living room. With that said, make sure to use soft white light bulbs or adjust the hanging height. It's so bright with the bulbs we're using, as we sit in living room the lights hit us in the eyes. That won't be a problem once we install a dimmer switch. It looks great with our decor and everyone that comes in compliments it. It took my husband 30 mins tops to install it. The hardest part was deciding the length to hang it from ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: ♤I'm Missy the mama of em.♤

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this light!!! It’s so perfect if you are looking for something farmhousr/contemporary. It has the modern feel but rustic charm. For the price you can’t beat this light. The quality is just as good as any other light we looked at at Lowe’s and Home D. We put dimmer bulbs in and installed a dimmer switch as well. It really looks amazing in person. It’s definitely larger in person but I think that’s better. Highly recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M.

customer_reviews.title: Great style & well-priced light
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome. We purchased it to hang above a kitchen table in a high end house that we're flipping, and it looks amazing! Similarly styled lights sell for far more money. We have recommended this light to a friend, and will use another in a future flip.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, great looking, and truly an amazing deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, great looking and a lot heavier and bigger than I expected! This is a very sturdy fixture and it is considerably larger than I expected, which is good because I am hanging it in the foyer! I would compare the size to a large beach ball that is blown up. I cannot believe the price either! What an amazing deal! It truly is comparable to the higher priced fixtures I've seen in the stores that sell for over $200!. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: One of my All Time Favorite Purchases
customer_reviews.text: Truly my favorite purchase on Amazon. Not only was the price amazing but the look of this chandelier is insane. It completely transformed my dining room. I can't believe how perfect it looks. Came packaged well. Installations was about as easy as it gets for installing a chandelier. I'm so happy with how it turned out. It's by far my favorite light fixture in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for over my dining room table. My ceilings are very high so we had to buy some extra chain and wiring at home depot. My husband is very handy but not an electrician and he had no problems with the installation. The light is beautiful and I couldn't be more pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier! Will probably purchase again. The price was great and quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: heather sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I hung it in my stairwell so I could reach the bulbs to change & it’s the perfect size. Not too big you think you might hit your head on it but not too small it looks dinky. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: and they were perfect in either place
customer_reviews.text: Oh my. This is a gorgeous light fixture! We purchased two of the oil-rubbed bronze version and hung one in our foyer and another in the dining room, and they were perfect in either place. I wanted identical fixtures for a calm, not jarring, line of sight, and they also match my curtain rods. Anyway, they are sizable and quality, the metal is strong and doesn't bend. It's a perfect blend of contemporary (round), yet traditional (candle lights) for us. Yet, you could use "industrial" lights, too, if you like the contemporary industrial look. So light fixture provides flexibility. Hard to believe they're available at the price listed! Beyond happy.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Virginia Professional

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great light. Especially for the price. I have been looking for a reasonably priced chandelier for our dining room for some time now and this one fit the bill. I like the size of it, not too large and not too small. We have a small open dining area with vaulted ceiling and I think that it fills the space nicely without being overpowering. A classic but trendy style that even if it goes out of favor in a few years, it will have been worth the price paid. I just need to find some prettier bulbs because you can clearly see them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a builder's overhead light in the breakfast area with this light. Loved it so much, I removed the ugly yellow brass fixture in the foyer with the same light to match. I can't believe how pretty they both are and how reasonably priced they were. Everything I needed was included, except the bulbs. Ordered a pack of six LED chandelier bulbs (Edison style) and they worked perfectly. I just remodeled an older house last year and wish I would have known about these lights before, since I spent a whole lot more on brushed nickel fixtures, and these are just as pretty and functional. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: V S Tilden

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty entry light
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, fairly light. The arms and candle bases are hard to get perfectly straight. Rewired and chained for a vaulted ceiling without a problem. Interesting entry light. Added LED candle lights and a Leviton assistant enabled dimmer that plays nice with LEDs and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Allred

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Stunning
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is absolutely stunning! Got the gorgeous modern farmhouse look I was going for for a fraction of the cost. I originally saw this chandelier on Wayfair for about $40 more than on Amazon. Got it delivered super fast with Amazon Prime and I couldn't be happier. I paired it with frosted LED daylight white light bulbs and installed a dimmer switch. At first I thought it might be too big for our dining space but it is actually perfect. Next: building a farmhouse table to go with it! These are the light bulbs:  And this dimmer switch:
customer_reviews.author: Emily Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. I did it myself in an afternoon while hubby was at work. It’s very large and substantial. I was worried the copper colored highlights would be a bit too much but they are very subtle in person.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! It's really pretty in our dining room. We didn't need to use any of the chain (just one link to attach the light to the ceiling hook) because we don't have super high ceilings (10' maybe?). I did obsess about trying to get the light centered with the rings but finally gave up because it would look straight from one spot in the room and off center from another so I finally gave up. I've asked a few friends and they say it looks straight so I think I'm good!
customer_reviews.author: mom2011

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but a bit dim with just 3 bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: My husband just hung this light yesterday. It is very stylish and gave our dining area a little update. However, it is a little too dim for this area with it being a 3 bulb light, especially with candelabra bulbs. I do love the way it looks, so I will keep it. I will probably end up hanging it in the entry way and purchasing something else for the dining area.
customer_reviews.author: Carlla Whitescarver

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous look for a great value
customer_reviews.text: It looks fabulous and only for a fraction of the price of similar products. Also, really easy to install. I'm very happy with my purchase! The only thing I would add is that, as it takes 3 lamp bulbs of 40w each, it won't give you an awful lot of light, so it's best to use on areas where you don't need a lot of light or where you have other light fixtures like standing lamps and such.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia L.

customer_reviews.title: Totally in love!
customer_reviews.text: We really love the look of this light! I agonized over a new light fixture for months and finally settled on this one. The price point was so much more economical than comparable products and I couldn’t justify spending a fortune on a light. So glad I did! The light offers a fair amount for our space. I will share the light is dispersed out and up, so it’s slightly limited just below the fixture, but that doesn’t dampen our overall feelings regarding the purchase. Very happy customers here!
customer_reviews.author: JNW13

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to update our 20-year-old light fixture in our dining room. This was a great choice! It is very sturdy, modern farmhouse look & a great price. It has a five year warranty. Matches our furniture perfectly! We swagged the chandelier over with a hook to center it over our table & installed a dimmer switch. Ordered everything from Amazon (chandelier, bulbs, & dimmer switch). Arrived quickly in time for Mother’s Day! Super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally obsessed with my new lights! I ordered two for my laundry room to replace my boring standard flush mount lights. These did not disappoint—they put out a great deal of light and their design makes it so the light is dispersed all over the room. These were super easy to install and easy to adjust to the right length. The quality is fantastic for the price, and they look more expensive than what they are. I would definitely recommend these lights, and I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive.
customer_reviews.text: We love this light. It looks great on or off. I wish that it had been sent with better packaging. It was just sent in the retail box and came a little bit bent. I was able to bend the hoops back in shape but it was a bit of a bother. The installation is a bit challenging because you have to thread the wires through a center bolt. I also wish that it came with LED light bulbs but the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking light for the money! Very similar to one I fell in love with for $1,500 elsewhere! The instructions kinda assume you know what you are doing and are very brief but we were able to get it done in about an hour. I am moderately handy and have replaced lights before (just FYI since another review made it sound like they just popped it up in 20 min)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for the right fixture for our dining room. Took over an hour to install it with my husband because he thought he could do it without reading the directions that came with. If he followed the paper, we could have easily installed within a half hour. Love the size, color and look. So gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: Shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap look
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The pendants look great in the picture BUT, the metal on the inside of sphere edges is not smooth or very silver. This is obvious when the light is on. The lightbulb housing part on one of the 2 pendants was crooked causing the bulb to hang very crooked. Even tried several kinds of bulbs, all crooked. Very noticeable since you clearly see the bulb in the sphere. We didn’t notice this issue until fixture was installed and by then it had already been wired in and the warranty window had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Vint

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rustic look!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a medium to smaller dining room. It is beautiful! The curved metal slats came slightly mis aligned but was easy to mold into shape. Easy to install too! We found that hanging it 30 inches above the table was perfect. I would recommend...especially for the price!!! The picture was before decorating! The picture mistakenly makes the globe look egg shape but it is round.
customer_reviews.author: Jana H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an amazing light! We absolutely love it. It was alot bigger in my space than I was expecting but it is completely perfect! I have been looking for months & when I found this and the price so reasonable I knew it had to be the 1! Thank You Love It!!!! ***Update 04-01-2019*** Still absolutely Love this light! So many great compliments and it so very beautiful a year later, my favorite light!!!
customer_reviews.author: harley momma

customer_reviews.title: Looks simple and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fixture in a silver finish that is called 'brushed nickel'. I tried to match the finish to other things around that are of brushed nickel. I am not sure why this one was called that way because is it too shiny for brushed nickel and it is, probably, why I think the fixture looks inexpensive. Probably, if finish is less shiny, I would rate it better, otherwise it is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Olga F.

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist island lights
customer_reviews.text: If you like a minimalist look, these lights are simple and inexpensive. Even though they aren't expensive, they look great. I installed three of them over a 10 ft island in my kitchen. They come with an adequate cord but it wasn't long enough for my high ceilings, so I had to buy and have electricians attach them to the unit. It added to the cost, but I like these units and the final product is just what I wanted. I highly recommend them if you like a high-tech, silver, minimalist look.
customer_reviews.author: Dr L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fixture, everything about it is a nightmare!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst light fixture ever. Installation was hard and the parts, including the wires, were all made so damn cheap that they would rip apart while trying to put up the fixture, which I wouldn’t expect from an almost $200 fixture. The screws to hold the different parts of the frame didn’t fit and would always fall off, and there were parts missing. Furthermore, the instructions were absolute crap and didn’t have any actual directions on them, just one small picture with the 50 different parts on it, most of which didn’t even come with the fixture. Don’t waste your money on this, definitely go with a cheaper, more reputable one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had a puny antique bronze fixture in my entryway...this is much more substantial and modern. Used LED filament bulbs and it puts out a lot of lot. I had a handyman install it....said it took longer to unpack it than to install!!! Great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: villager

customer_reviews.title: Installed this my farmhouse dining Room
customer_reviews.text: The 6 light was pretty big but loved it over my dining room table. It is great quality and very affordable. The only issue with installation was the bulbs, I bought the ones that were recommended on here, which did not have a plastic protective top on the base of the bulb and didn't realize without that, when the metal from the light fixture hit the bulb, it blew my whole switch out. I ordered new bulbs with the plastic guard on them and it was completely fine.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY NERI

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY...it's installed, and I LOVE it! I have these types of lights, but they are all made of black metal, I really LOVE the slight contrast of brown and black metals. And, I love the size, perfect over my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: T.  Lee

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product Received
customer_reviews.text: The lamp I received is defective. The outer ring that the cross-pieces screw into only came with 4 holes rather than 6 and they are incorrectly spaced. I could probably figure out how to drill more holes to correctly space the cross pieces, but not without leaving two unfilled and very visible holes where they were incorrectly drilled by the manufacturer. I have no idea how I could return it now that it is out of its packaging. I am hoping to get a replacement ring to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2!
customer_reviews.text: These were an awesome upgrade to the brassy gold fixtures in my house we purchased. They make such a HUGE difference and I get tons of compliments on them. One is hanging at the entry foyer and the other is hanging above the dining room table. Super easy install too. My husband had them done in less than 10 minutes each.
customer_reviews.author: NikiM

customer_reviews.title: light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This coordinated well with my other brushed nickel fixtures & handles. It came assembled which was nice but when it was hung you clearly saw how crooked it was, hence the 4 stars. My handyman was able to adjust it so no problem. Just know that it can be moved about somewhat. The nickel is thin & fixture is light but it was a good value & looks good. It hangs above my small table in my breakfast nook.
customer_reviews.author: love to tread

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking at similar fixtures that cost twice as much, so I grabbed this one when I found it. It looks great, assembly and installation was quick and straightforward, and I was able to do it myself. For my space I needed to shorten the chain to just a few links, which was also a simple process. The finished product looks great - just what I wanted. I use the vintage style bulbs for a warm, candle-like look. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Land

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful. My husband and I struggled a little because he was impatient with following directions and cut the wire short. He struggled with figuring out wires as these are not colored. Took about two hours to assemble, but we figured it out! It looks beautiful in my entry. Great price because people have commented on,how expensive this is. I didn't tell them how much I paid, we will let them think it was expensive!
customer_reviews.author: cmhavs21

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! I used to work in lighting design so I know in lighting you generally get what you pay for. I sold everything from high end brands, to low end so I have to say when this arrived I didn’t have high hopes but after reading the reviews, and needing something to put up quick while being on a tight budget, I was impressed when I pulled it out of the box! For the value, you absolutely cannot beat this! The finish is great, the size was perfect, and it is sturdy while achieving the look you’d otherwise get with lights that are two-three time more expensive. Best of all my hubs had no problem installing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zaine Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful farmhouse charm!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lightfixture! We rewired it with "PRUNLLA Vintage 18/2 Industrial Electrical Hemp Rope Cord" purchased from Amazon, and hung it from a pulley and cleat in our stairwell so that we can lower/raise it to change the bulbs. The rope and pulley add to the rustic farmhouse charm of the fixture. We get compliments on the fixture all the time!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture! Just what I was expecting. Originally bought for our foyer that has tall vaulted ceilings but realized it wouldn’t be long enough, so we ended up using it over our dining table. So glad we kept it! Cons: The light sockets were a little crooked so it looked a little funny when we tried screwing in the bulbs. The stryrofoam packaging got everywhere and stuck to everything but wasn’t too hard to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Steen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I assembled myself and had an electrician install. He did it in less than 20 minutes. Goes perfect with my living and dining room decor. Just as pictured and great for the price. I added a dimmer switch to mine by myself to adjust the lighting when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this light fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful light fixture. I have gotten multiple compliments on this light. It is a perfect fit above our dining room table. It gives off a great amount of light and looks great with dimmed light as well. This is the best price I could find for a fixture of this size and design. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kimbell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our light and have received many compliments on it. People cannot believe how little we paid for it! The only trouble I had installing it, was the ground-wire is the silver very skinny wire...I’m used the to ground-wire being copper, so that caused a little confusion. Otherwise, very easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Wrigley17

customer_reviews.title: Good value and looks great but don’t expect it too much
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3-light in brushed nickel. I like it, it’s exactly what I needed to give some old styling in my new home a budget facelift. However, just know that if your eyesight is good and you will be within 5 feet or so of the fixture, you will notice plenty of imperfections in the finish. I should have expected it at this price point. Oh well. Still like my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, modern sleek lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are gorgeous!!! Unfortunately I had to return because they were too big for my smaller island. I almost wanted to keep them t use elsewhere but just couldn’t. They are so modern and sleek and update any area immediately!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this light so much! We replaced a much more expensive light with this one and I feel like it was such an upgrade! This light was easy to assemble and it's beautiful. It's large and it looks really nice. The bronze color is perfect. It's not too brown like some bronze fixtures I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Love this chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier! We put it in the foyer to replace an old brass light fixture. My husband installed with no difficulty at all. Chain was perfect length to show through the window above the door. So happy with this purchase. The only thing I would change is the wattage on the bulbs - I wish it was 60 watts vs 40 watts; but it still puts off enough light for the foyer!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light - Short Chain
customer_reviews.text: Nice chandelier for the price!! I’m glad I purchased it. The only downside was the chain wasn’t as long as I thought it was going to be. I wish I could’ve hung it a bit lower (about another 6-12”) in my foyer area as the ceilings are so high and because of window light hangs in front of as I couldn’t center it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fixture. Light weight. Took it apart and reconfigured how the rings sit. Looks just like an expensive one I wanted that was $425!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Claunch

customer_reviews.title: Brushed nickel, 3 bulb fixture
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty light fixture, the brushed nickel look is nice. It does have some scratches here and there but hopefully once it's hung it won't be as noticable. It does come in 2 separate pieces, the globe part comes complete but you need to install the part that attaches to the ceiling to hang the actual light that part was little time consuming and unexpected I've never seen a light fixture that came with a main part unassembled before.
customer_reviews.author: Neeners503

customer_reviews.title: May be a tough installation but it is GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! It goes so well with our farmhouse theme. We did order ours for a discounted rate from amazon warehouse though. The item was clearly returned and just shoved back in the box by the previous person. My husband complained it was a mess and the instructions weren’t in the box. He said it was not easy to hang. It took him and my dad together to do it. Anyways, I’m here giving 5 stars on how gorgeous it is!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Starr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! And such a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this above the bed in our fairly small master bedroom. It is beautiful and I've received many compliments on it! I can't believe how inexpensive it was. Easily the best value out of all the light fixtures in my home. The bar holding the lights, however, is not perfectly centered. I can't seem to bend it back, but I love the light too much to care!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo happy with this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don't do justice to this light fixture. It far exceeded my expectations and looks absolutely amazing in our dining room. I chose to use Edison Lightbulbs w/amber glass vs traditional chandelier style lightbulbs and I love the look they give it. It doesn't show up well in the photo but I couldn't be happier with this purchase. Fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is as advertised and is very nice and modern.
customer_reviews.text: I love the light - it goes very well with our new stainless steel appliances and is a great asset. The only draw back is it has only 3 light bulbs and they are only 40 watt - my husband thinks we'll be in the dark this winter. It would have been nice to have been able to use 60 watt bulbs, however the 5 light fixture was too large for our space.
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Great Look!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the price was right and the light fixtures look just as pictured. We bought warm Edison bulbs to complete the look, and we are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light at amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is completely beautiful. I cannot believe it only cost $25. We bought this to put in our home I love the way it looks. I'm probably going to order a few more for the hallways. It would look really great hanging above the stairwell. But those cast some odd Shadows because of the sphere, but I kind of like that. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Chains
customer_reviews.text: The single bulb model doesn’t come with a chain or down rods. I was able install the new one by using the existing down rods from the previous ones that I had. These were replacements and are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I had a neighbor install mine (I don’t touch electrical) but he had absolutely no issues with the install. It was well packaged and went together perfectly. It looks fantastic. I paired mine with the led lights from Costco. So bright! I get compliments every time someone sees it. It brings me joy each time I see it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer St.John

customer_reviews.title: 6 lightbulbs & great price
customer_reviews.text: This light was the perfect addition to our room with 6 lightbulbs at a great price! love the expensive look and the great amount of light! We have ours on a dimmer so we can adjust the light as we need it and I could not be happier about this addition to our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Coxe

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought the smaller 3 light version to hang in our vaulted foyer. It was completely dwarfed once we saw it up. We ended up getting this one as a replacement and I am so glad we did! It is stunning and everyone who sees it in our new home complements it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla F

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Look amazing over our bar height counter in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: AceReif

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Such an updated chandelier. I love the look and even the shadows that it casts. The oil rubbed bronze finish looks great.I get so many compliments. Everyone that has seen it loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light for nice price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a temp fix until I found something else but I really Love this light - the price was right - easy to hang and packaged great ohh and it looks fantastic ! I’m impressed
customer_reviews.author: ChristiGriff

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very pretty and not the same old, same old. We have a high ceiling in breakfast area. All white walls. Whitewashed table and chaird. Coastal vibe. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture and excellent price!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to purchase this fixture!! It was easy to install (I watched a couple YouTube videos and did it myself) and looks way more expensive than it was. I love the oil rubbed bronze finish. It doesn’t put off a ton of light but I am ok with that and there are some shadows but I suppose that is just the style of the fixture. Either way, it looks much better than the old school brass fixture we had before.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This fixture looks like it is worth twice the amount. It is beautiful! However, it is much larger than I anticipated. We purchased for our dining room but it was too large as we have 8 ft ceilings. We ended up putting in our master bath because we have a vaulted ceiling in there. It looks amazing! Perfect for anyone who is looking for a modern farmhouse look.
customer_reviews.author: KES0925

customer_reviews.title: Large center of attention in any room.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and a show stopper ! The color is rich and looks like wood but is a sturdy metal. We used in our dining room over a 6 chair table and it's perfect size. Would look beautiful in a bedroom or entryway. You won't be disappointed. Love our new light fixture for our Modern Farmhouse !
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Cervantes Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my skincare studio and it is absolutely perfect! I’ve had tons of compliments from my clients. Several asked where I purchased it from so snag it up! You won’t be disappointed. It’s also extremely easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly austin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light for my dining room. I attached photos to show how it looks in real life. We plan on lowering it once we move in our dining room table. This light is gorgeous and very trendy right now. You cannot beat the price! I've seen similar light fixtures prices at $150! Love it and wish I had the wiring set up for a second one!
customer_reviews.author: lange2

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts :-(
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. The horizontal ring that encircles the whole fixture was missing from the box. My electrician installed the fixture so that I’d have light but it looks weird. Overall, I think the fixture would look nice if it were complete. Not the best quality but nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jenny p

customer_reviews.title: The light itself was very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Missing a decorative screw and when I called about it they said it was no longer being made. I had already hung the light and I didn't want to remove it. When I ordered it should have noted that this was a discontinued product so I really see this as a Amazon problem. The light itself was very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a simple but notable statement
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple, modern looking. Doesn’t give much light though (I got the led 40watt equivalent, soft). I love how it looks and lights , I love the design it makes on the ceiling. Perfect size-not too big, not too small, for a medium sized dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Travelpleasures

customer_reviews.title: Hangs straight and is not at all cheap looking. .
customer_reviews.text: No big assembly needed. It comes in one piece as expected. We hung above our kitchen table . It’s not too big so for a smaller space it’s perfect. You would need two if you were going to hang above counters. It would be hreativer a sink or in a small dining room. Nice color and doesn’t look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Notetoself

customer_reviews.title: CAREFULL UNPACKING
customer_reviews.text: Great chandelier with MUCH better finish than expected. But, you must take your time removing the packing/wrapping. If you just use scissors and cut away, then you will damage the finish. Straight forward to assemble and install if you are used to working with electricity, but not necessarily a project for a novice.
customer_reviews.author: Two Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, wish they had a down rod
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. They were easy to install and they look great! The only thing is I wish they came with a down rod. The cable doesn’t hang straight. I had to rig it using the down rods from my previous lights.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great update for not a lot of money!
customer_reviews.text: What a great update for our dinette! This was an awesome purchase. It was relatively inexpensive plus it looks amazing! Assembly was pretty easy considering it was shipped flat. I love the look and finished product. My husband had no issues with the installation.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA THORNBURG

customer_reviews.title: You will love it/them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a guest room. The room is not very large so they are hanging over the nightstands. By not using lamps there is more space for guests to use the entire top of thenightstands. I have today I looked a long time for the right look. These make the room.I am very happy.Let’s add a few more verbs in that last Sentence! 😍
customer_reviews.author: kathleen goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Wires are not clearly labeled
customer_reviews.text: Seems to look OK but it doesn't have the usual white/black wiring which made installation harder than normal
customer_reviews.author: kevin KC

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a light that is really bright this is not it. Also be sure to follow the directions, I turned a 30 minute install into a three hour mess by putting parts on in the wrong order. Now that it's up it looks great, wish it was a bit brighter though. It does not come with the bulbs just an FYI
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and looks great. It does look like copper - and I mention that only because sometimes copper can have a brassy look, which this doesn't. Be sure to get the edison light bulbs. They look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brock

customer_reviews.title: Just Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤️Love ❤️ Love ❤️ I purchase this as a statement piece for my dining area! We get so many compliments on it , great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my entryway. They were exactly as pictured. Very well made. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breakfast nook budget lighting success!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a very practical woman. I’d rather save money for retirement or give to those less fortunate....but buying extravagant lighting just doesn’t rank as a priority....This breakfast lighting was easy to install & provided just the right amount of sophistication to this space. Take note....the lighting shoots up and out...not down on to the table.
customer_reviews.author: baseballmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our apartment. I paid $55 and it's even a few dollars cheaper now. It looks like a more expensive fixture and my husband had no problems installing it. I'm very happy with it - it's much nicer looking that the more traditional fixture it replaced. We hung it high because we don't have a table underneath but it could also be hung over a table.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than pictured
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than pictured that was definitely a plus. This fixture replaced a dated gold rim light above the landing as you go up the stairs in our home. It brought a much needed modern element to that area and was better fit in relation to our high ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: tweehondeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Dining Room Light
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed over my dining table and it's beautiful. Everyone that comes to my house compliments it. It was a little larger than I was expecting, but the size grew on me. Great item for the value.
customer_reviews.author: rfgd

customer_reviews.title: Elegance and quality
customer_reviews.text: My pictures speak louder!!!!!! Love and Love my chandelier!!!! WOW Beautiful and is so huge!!!!! Elegant, worth every single penny I paid for it!!!!! Don’t hesitated to buy this stunning Chandelier! I will definitely buy again from this seller!!!! I also bought the same chandelier medium size for the entrance of my house, picture coming soon!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy’s Bling Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great light if your looking to get your "Joanna Gaines" on.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for a great price. It's pretty big, which we were looking for as our dining room is pretty large. Just for scale, our ceiling is about 12ft tall where the light is mounted. The table is 13ft long. I would definitely recommend this light fixture!
customer_reviews.author: Talon

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in my entry way
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking chandelier that I put in my entry way and I receive a lot of compliments on it. It has a rustic and industrial look to it that I love. It was easy to install and was a great purchase. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light on  light.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty, not too big...but it doesn't give off a lot of light. Keep that in mind with where you want it. I have it in my bedroom...I wish I had ore light, but it is very pretty hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Darci B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Really love these lights; they are a bit smaller than I expected but they work great over my island. I used round bulbs and it looks great with the shape of the light. I receive a lot of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful light for my kitchen. The lights were bright so we put them on a dimmer switch. My husband had no problem installing this light. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this light if you want to make a statement then this is the light for you, so beautiful yet classic, the lights are soft not in your face bright adds that extra zing to my dinning room table.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, perfect size over island
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty as a final result. The electrician said it was a simple install, also. The only issue we ran across was that I had to wiggle the bulbs into the base to get them to turn on upon initial install. Once the light came on inneach individual bulb we had no further issues. It’s very pretty and it gives off the perfect amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work, then neither did the replacement chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Set up this chandelier and nothing happened when I flicked the switch. Got a voltmeter to confirm that the light itself was defective. Tested against the chandelier I was replacing to confirm I was test correctly. Requested a replacement, tested it right out of the box, found the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin W Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful, well made, and exactly as shown. LOVE IT in my dining room
customer_reviews.author: connieer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't be sorry...
customer_reviews.text: Received the item intact and ready to hang with minor assembly. No scratches, dents or dings. Had the light hung in about an hour. Love it! The light actually looks more expensive than it is once hung. It was one of the first remodeling touches added in the kitchen of or our original 1861 farm house. The light was purchased to be one of the focal points and I like the fact that it gives an updated look and blends so well with any decor. We get compliments on it all of the time and I couldn't be happier with it... Now the rest of the work begins! Anyone want to help take down wallpaper? Lol...
customer_reviews.author: john richardson

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 6333600 Stella Mira Six-Light Indoor Chandelier, Barnwood and Oil Rubbed Bronze Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Barnwood| Size:6-Light ChandelierVintage-industrial style radiates from the open sphere design of the Westinghouse Stella Mira six-light chandelier. The metal orb is handsomely finished in Barnwood encircling an oil rubbed bronze candelabra with six twinkling lights. This indoor chandelier's dramatic size commands attention in an entryway, over a dining room table or kitchen island. The Stella Mira will also complement open concept kitchens and living areas in industrial, traditional and Rustic style homes. This Westinghouse indoor chandelier is backed by a 5-year limited manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship and ETL/cetl listed for safety. Westinghouse is a trusted, global brand. Westinghouse knows lighting and offers products with exceptional quality, reliability and functionality. Product reference number 63336.
feature_bullets: Rustic vintage-industrial style six-light chandelier is perfect for entryways and dining rooms
Two-tone barnwood and Oil Rubbed Bronze finishes add vintage appeal. Adjustable length for perfect positioning
Uses six 40-watt candelabra-base light bulbs (not included), or for a vintage appeal use Westinghouse timeless or filament LED light bulbs
26-15/16-inches in height; 24-inches in diameter; 36 inch chain; 60 inch cord
Five-year limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship; ETL/cetl listed.Recommended Light Bulb Shape Code:CA10
